mapper.sql: id, uid, title, start_time, update_user, update_time, url, type, page_view, praise, del_flag,description
mapper.insert: insert into cy_process_file (id, uid, title, start_time, update_user, update_time, url, type, page_view, praise, del_flag, description) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{pageView,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{praise,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update cy_process_file
uid = #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR},
page_view = #{pageView,jdbcType=INTEGER},
praise = #{praise,jdbcType=INTEGER},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update cy_process_file set uid = #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, page_view = #{pageView,jdbcType=INTEGER}, praise = #{praise,jdbcType=INTEGER}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update cy_process_file set del_flag = 1, update_time = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id in
#{item}
mapper.select:
select
from cy_process_file
title like #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and del_flag = 0 order by id desc
select id from cy_process_file order by id desc limit 0,1

select cy_process_file.id, uid, title, start_time,DATE_FORMAT(cy_process_file.start_time,'%Y-%m-%d') startTimeString, update_user,DATE_FORMAT(cy_process_file.update_time,'%Y-%m-%d') updateTimeString, cy_process_file.update_time, url, type, page_view, praise, cy_process_file.del_flag,description, cy_user.real_name from cy_process_file join cy_user on cy_process_file.uid = cy_user.id ORDER BY page_view desc LIMIT 0,#{count}
